conflict_categories.name: Ad Blockers
conflict_categories.description: Running multiple ad blockers can slow down your browser and cause websites to break.

conflict_categories.name: VPN Services
conflict_categories.description: Activating multiple VPN extensions simultaneously can lead to network conflicts or connection drops.

conflict_categories.name: Shopping Coupon Finders
conflict_categories.description: Multiple coupon extensions may override each other, preventing you from getting the best deal.

conflict_categories.name: Tab Managers
conflict_categories.description: Using several tab managers can lead to conflicts in organizing and suspending tabs.

deprecated_extensions.name: The Great Suspender (Original)
deprecated_extensions.reason: This extension was removed from the store due to reports of malware.

deprecated_extensions.name: Honey
deprecated_extensions.reason: Reported as a potentially problematic or scam extension. Consider uninstalling for security.
